name: createSignedJWT
description: Create a signed JWT (JSON Web Signature - JWS)

params.name: payload
params.description: The payload as a string or struct.

params.name: signOptions
params.description: Create the signature using the key information from the given struct

params.name: config
params.description:
A struct with the following values:
- algorithm : algorithm used for signing.
- generateIssuedAt : boolean to indicate whether to generate "iat" field
- generateJti : boolean to indicate whether to generate "jti" field

links.title: JSON Web Tokens in ColdFusion
links.description: Overview of JSON Web Tokens (JWT), including how to use them in ColdFusion
